author: China Uncensored
description:
I need your help! Support China Uncensored at https://chinauncensored.tv

China’s attempt to detain an Indian woman transiting through Shanghai has blown up into a major diplomatic embarrassment. From denying Arunachal Pradesh’s existence to mocking travelers, Beijing is once again provoking India—and getting called out for it. In this episode, Chris breaks down the renewed tensions, why the CCP is doubling down, and how India and Japan could team up to push back.

title: India And China Are Headed To Another War
